revised_title: Meteorological Observations and Atmospheric Tides in Dukhun, East Indies
tldr: This paper by W.H. Sykes discusses meteorological observations and atmospheric tides in Dukhun, East Indies. It covers topics such as the existence and occurrence of atmospheric tides, the impact of elevation on tidal oscillations, and the relationship between temperature and atmospheric pressure. The study also compares the climate of Dukhun with other regions, including Europe and India.
